---
title: "About"
---

This website is an information set of Econ Master, Predoc and Econ PhD, that mainly containing the applying projects and economists' suggestions etc. And the module "Econ Resources" is the ensemble of online resources related to economics.

这个网站是作为一个经济学硕士/Predoc/PhD申请信息集合，主要包括申请项目信息（支持力度、费用、领域），一些过来人以及学者等不同角度的人的申请建议。同时包括一些在经济学领域相关的线上资源。

This website is built under the Quarto, deployed in Netlify.

该网站是由[Quarto](https://quarto.org/)环境下创建，部署在[Netlify](https://app.netlify.com/)中。
